record.description: Looking west from the Illinois Central railroad tracks at 55th Street and Lake Park [after the start of] Urban Renewal.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: Photograph is stained, scratched and dog-eared at all corners. Stamp: University of Chicago Public Relations Office. Stamp: Please Return to Time/date received. Stamp: Please return to University of Chicago Department of Public Relations.
